title: Saina Nehwal biopic:As Parineeti Chopra Strikes Saina Nehwal's Iconic Pose, Ace Shuttler Sends 'Best Wishes' For Biopic
text:
With so many biopics being made in Bollywood, another one based on the life of ace shuttler Saina Nehwal has been in the pipeline since a very long time now. Earlier, Shraddha Kapoor was signed for the project. She even practiced the sport to polish her skills and several behind-the-scene pictures went viral too. However, she opted out of the project for reasons unknown. That is when Parineeti Chopra replaced her.

Twitter

Parineeti has also been training hard to play the Indian badminton player’s role on the big screen. The actress recently shared the first look from the movie, which will soon go on floors, we are bowled over. Take a look, as she strikes Saina Nehwal’s iconic pose.

Instagram

She had earlier as well posted a picture from the training sessions. It seems Parineeti is giving her best and sweating out to learn the game. She seens neck-deep in the preprations of the movie.

Instagram

Saina is excited to watch the movie too. “Looking forward to this journey together! My best wishes to the team,” she wrote on Twitter.

Talking about the movie, Parineeti had earlier told PTI, "The shooting will start soon. I am currently training for it very hard. I am playing badminton for two hours and getting trained and doing prep work for an hour. I recently wrapped up 'The Girl on The Train'. These two films are very interesting films of my career and it is something I have not done before and I hope people like it.”

Titled Saina, the biopic will be directed by Amol Gupte who is known for movies like Stanley Ka Dabba and Hawa Hawaai among others.
